name: Fried Chicken
steps: Season the chicken with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Coat the chicken with flour.
Heat oil in a pan.
Fry the chicken until golden brown and cooked through.

name: ABC Soup
steps: Bring a pot of water to a boil.
Add pork ribs and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add carrots, potatoes, and onions, and continue simmering.
Add tomatoes and cook for another 10 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.

name: Brownies
steps: Melt the chocolate and butter together.
Mix in sugar, eggs, and flour.
Pour the batter into a baking dish.
Bake for 25 minutes at 180°C.

name: Beef Wellington
steps: Sear the beef tenderloin until browned on all sides.
Prepare a mushroom mixture and spread over the beef.
Wrap the beef in prosciutto and puff pastry.
Brush with egg yolk and bake at 200°C for 30 minutes.

name: Fish and Chips
steps: Prepare a batter with flour, baking powder, salt, and beer.
Coat the fish fillets in the batter.
Deep fry until golden brown.
Fry the potatoes to make chips.

name: Oreo Ice Cream
steps: Whip the cream until stiff peaks form.
Fold in the condensed milk and crushed Oreo cookies.
Freeze for at least 4 hours before serving.

name: Steam Chicken Rice
steps: Marinate the chicken with soy sauce and sesame oil.
Steam the chicken until fully cooked.
Cook the rice with garlic and ginger.
Serve the chicken over the rice.

name: Soup Dumpling
steps: Prepare the pork filling and mix in the gelatin broth.
Wrap the filling in dumpling wrappers.
Steam the dumplings until cooked.
Serve with soy sauce and vinegar.

name: Red Sauce Pasta
steps: Cook the pasta according to the package instructions.
Sauté garlic and onion in olive oil.
Add the tomato sauce and basil, simmer for 15 minutes.
Toss the cooked pasta with the sauce and serve.
